subject: Baseball
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Collectors and Collections
lead_paragraph: Armed with jerseys, baseballs, folding chairs and coffee, baseball fans and memorabilia dealers gathered before dawn near a training facility to await the Yankees’ iconic shortstop.
snippet: Armed with jerseys, baseballs, folding chairs and coffee, baseball fans and memorabilia dealers gathered before dawn near a training facility to await the Yankees’ iconic shortstop.
